name: Disasterpiece
description:
Disasterpiece was created during our first ever game jam. You have to play as a town mayor and defeat hordes of zombies in a top down shooter style.  It was great fun, we learned a lot and we enjoyed the experience. Unfortunately we didn't even remotely get close to finishing the game, we are maybe continueing development in the near future to make our ideas reality. Anyways have fun testing our unfinished game and don't forget to play all the other awesome games of this gamejam.

Special thanks to:

PANTA for composing the music for our game. Link to his channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb5iJL1xtRAh-fJkkdTDFyQ

Daniel for programming the building system which couldn't be implemented YET. https://twitter.com/daniel_idac
